## fieldctl user list

List users

```
fieldctl user list [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --db string             database DSN
      --driver string         database driver
  -h, --help                  help for list
      --schema string         database schema
      --table-prefix string   table name prefix (default "gcfm_")
```
